components.name: Frontend
components.description: A web application built using React, responsible for user interaction and presenting data. It consumes APIs from the backend services.

components.name: Authentication Service
components.description: Manages user authentication and authorization using Azure Active Directory.  Handles user login, token issuance, and role-based access control.

components.name: API Gateway
components.description: Acts as a single entry point for all API requests, routing them to the appropriate backend services. Provides rate limiting and request transformation.

components.name: Business Logic Service
components.description: Contains the core application logic and interacts with the Data Service to perform operations.

components.name: Data Service
components.description: Provides access to the data stored in the Azure SQL Database.  Handles data retrieval and persistence.

data_flows.description: User requests are sent from the frontend to the API Gateway for processing.
The API Gateway routes requests to the Business Logic Service.
The Business Logic Service retrieves and updates data via the Data Service.
The API Gateway utilizes the Authentication Service to verify user credentials before routing requests.

trust_boundaries.name: Frontend Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The frontend is a publicly accessible component.  Strict input validation and output encoding are required to prevent XSS attacks.

trust_boundaries.name: API Gateway Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The API Gateway acts as a security layer, controlling access to backend services.  It should be configured with appropriate security policies.

trust_boundaries.name: Authentication Service Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The Authentication Service manages user credentials and should be isolated to prevent compromise.
